devdoc.details: Allows off-chain infrastructure to look up a hot wallet's deployed DesignatedVoting contract.

params._finder: keeps track of all contracts within the system based on their interfaceName.

params.owner: defines who will own the deployed instance of the designatedVoting contract.
params.voter: defines who will be able to vote on behalf of the owner, using the designatedVoting contract.

devdoc.title: Factory to deploy new instances of DesignatedVotingV2 and look up previously deployed instances.
